summary: This document is an invoice summary from J Epstein & Co Inc detailing shipping charges incurred through FedEx. It includes multiple entries for packages sent and received, along with associated costs and dates. The document highlights the financial transactions related to shipping services used by Epstein's company.

The total amount due for the invoice is $222.22.
